title: I love my language!
description: Hear about a woman's effort to keep her language alive

vocabItems.definition: relating to the people who originally lived in a place, rather than people who moved there from somewhere else
a feeling of happiness, pleasure or excitement
to give something to someone, usually in your family, who lives on after you die (phrasal verb)
small problems or delays that slow down or stop something from developing (informal)
immersionthe process of learning something, such as a language or a skill, by using only that and nothing elsecode-switchingchanging between two or more languages when you are speaking
